Article Title: Notions on a Psychiatry committed to Human Rights
Abstract: The paper outlines cornerstones for a different, innovative psychiatry providing crisis resolution teams, crisis families, open wards, supported employment, real estate therapy, housing first, providing care for older people with mental disorders, social space approach, compensation system, lump sum remuneration - as a basis for a human rights obliged psychiatry.
